package XXLChess
  • Class
    Description
    Amazon
     
    AnimationVehicle
    This class represents the movement animation of a chess piece.
    App
    This is the main application class.
    App.TileColor
    Class containing color definitions for different tile states.
    Archbishop
     
    Bishop
     
    Board
    Board represents the game board of the game.
    Bot
    This class represents a computer player (bot) in the chess game.
    BotAIStrategy
     
    Camel
     
    Chancellor
     
    Game
    This class represents a game of chess.
    Game.GameStatus
     
    GameReport
    This class represents a report of a finished game.
    GameReport.EndReason
    The reason why the game ended.
    General
     
    Human
    This class represents a human player in the chess game.
    InCheckIncident
    This class represents an incident where a King piece is under threat (in check) in a game of chess.
    InvalidMoveException
    This class represents an exception due to an invalid move by a player.
    King
     
    KingDignityException
    This class represents an exception due to a player attempting to kill the opponent's King.
    KingInDangerException
    This class represents an exception due to a player leaving their King in danger.
    KingProtectionWarning
    This class represents a warning that indicates the king is in danger.
    Knight
     
    Movement
    This class represents a move in the chess game.
    Pawn
     
    Piece
     
    Piece.Color
     
    PlayerAgent
    Abstract class that represents a player in the chess game.
    Queen
     
    RandomSelectionStrategy
     
    Rook
     
    RuleViolationException
    This class represents an exception due to a violation of chess rules by a player.
    SoundPlayer
    A class that plays sound clips in a separate thread.
    Tickable
    The Tickable interface represents objects that can be updated (ticked) and can end their lifecycle.
    Tile
     
    TimeoutException
    This class represents an exception due to a player's time expiring.
    Timer
    The Timer class represents a countdown timer that counts down frame by frame.
    Utils
